desc: Pacific Yak Angler, Canada's online kayak fishing store. Created to provide enthusiasts greater access to kayak fishing products. Visit our store!

layout.text: We Are Moving so Shipping will be interrupted between June 29th. Thanks in Advance for the continued support and understading.. Canada's Source for Kayak Fishing Gear & Accessories

Exploring the Pacific Northwest & Beyond
2% of sales are returned to Salmonid Enhancement Projects
